snippet: A commission to address a wide range of issues is expected to be announced in Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s State of the State address.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo is expected to announce in his State of the State address that he will convene a statewide commission to address a wide range of education issues, including improving student performance and school accountability
lead_paragraph: A commission to address a wide range of issues is expected to be announced in Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s State of the State address.

headline.seo: Cuomo Expected to Announce New Education Commission
headline.main: Governor Expected to Set Up Panel on Education Reform
headline.print_headline: Governor Expected to Set Up Panel on Education Reform
